name: BAR NANA RHUMBLE
description:
There's some monkey business going on...
Miss Gorilla has been thrown out of her favourite bar for unnecessary violence. Claim back your favourite drinking spot by beating up all of those damn party-poopers, especially that Bull guy.

Controls
Arrow Keys/WASD - Moving    (ZQSD for french version)
J - Melee attacks
K - Grab/Throw

Props and knocked out enemies can be grabbed and thrown, you can even grab enemies in mid-air if you're fast enough !

The Team :
Thomas Vignes (Programmer/Combat Designer)
Zakari Deladeriere (Game Designer/Sound Designer)
Victor Salembier (Game Designer/Combat Designer)
Karam Mescudi (UI Artist/Sound Designer)
Tiphaine Riallot (Character Artist/Animator)
Cyril Boivin (Color Artist/Animator)
Isaac Charlet (Color Artist/Animator)
Jean Mayeux (Background/3D Artist)

Ost used : Baccano - Guns & Roses
